channel.title: Android on tedn.life
channel.description: Recent content in Android on tedn.life

item.title: Effective Android - Getting Started Guide for the Android Dev Phone 1
item.description: This week I spend a day to get my new Android Phone up and running. At the end I figured it might make sense to write up a cookbook on what to do when you finally get your hands on the box and unwrap your new toy. Here we go ... The (ultimate :)) Android Getting Started Guide (for Mac Users :)) First things first: This guide assumes that you got yourself an Android Dev Phone 1.

item.title: Effective Andriod - a new category
item.description: Last year I introduced categories like "Link of the Month" and "Effective Mac" to my blogging". Heads up ... there is a new category coming: Effective Android will talk about my adventures with my new Android phone.
